name: Quantum Entanglement - Superposition
description:
You and your partner are dimension hopping explorers trying to reach the prime dimension's core vault. Unfortunately your dimensional tethers can only function when you are in relative superposition (I.E. if you get too far apart, you'll slip to your home dimensions). However, thanks to interdimensional collapsing objects, tears in space time, and a little ingenuity, you may just be able to use your dimensional tether's weakness to your advantage. Enter superposition and explore the multiverse.

Note: This is a spiritual successor to our first game jam game from 2019!

Note 2: This is a game designed with a two player experience in mind but is completely playable single player.

Note 3: The final level with 5 portals is unfortunately broken in build, and not possible to complete.

Player 1 Controls:

W,A,S,D movement

E to grab crates and mirrors

Player 2 Controls:

Arrow key movement

Right Shift to grab crates and mirrors

Universal Controls:

Hold R to restart stage

Esc to exit
